summary: This bill, the DOE and USDA Interagency Research Act, mandates collaborative research and development efforts between the Department of Energy and the Department of Agriculture. It directs the Secretaries of the departments to establish a memorandum of understanding and coordinate activities focused on advancing mission priorities through competitive, merit-reviewed processes. The bill outlines specific research areas, data sharing, infrastructure support, and report requirements to promote efficiency, reduce emissions, and foster innovation in agriculture and energy. It also calls for a report detailing coordination, achievements, and future opportunities.
